comments:
20030128
Plugins can be activated in any thread. Creating the ImageDescriptorRegistry is 
not possible in a plugin constructor. In JDT-UI we solved the problem by 
creating the ImageDescriptorRegistry delayed when the first image is requested 
(callers that need an image are in the UI thread).
